sources.description:
PizzaFLIX Presents Classic Movie Monday
Starring: Richard Talmadge, Gertrude Messinger, Robert Frazer
Director: Noel M. Smith

Who ya gonna call when an inventor's new aircraft and blueprints are stolen by a crooked businessman?  ‚ÄúThe Daredevil of the Screen‚Äù Dick Talmadge, that's who!

TRIVIA: Richard Talmadge, born Sylvester Ricardo Metzetti, was a member of the Flying Metzettis, a family of acrobats renowned for originating the quadruple back somersault!

Are you a PizzaFLIX Fanatic? Join our exclusive Fan Club for dedicated Classic movie lovers: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCE34fwgW7kWr7tc7YiOWtRw/join

sources.title: The Fighting Pilot 1935
sources.description: imdb: An inventor develops a new type of aircraft. A crooked businessman attempts to buy it but the inventor refuses to sell it to him, whereupon the rejected businessman and his henchmen steals the plane and its blueprints

metadata.Plot: An inventor develops a new type of aircraft. A crooked businessman attempts to buy it but the inventor refuses to sell it to him, whereupon the rejected businessman and his henchmen steals the plane and its blueprints. The plane's test pilot, who is the boyfriend of the inventor's daughter, and his sidekick set out to get the plane, and the plans, back.
metadata.Actors: Richard Talmadge, Gertrude Messinger, Robert Frazer
